name: fully decentralized Github environment
description: I'm not sure where we have got to on fully decentralized Github environment, but that has been a #1 thing which I think we need for many years. Darkfi use Codeberg via Tor, but it still a dependency on a centralized service provider. Axis made Mango way back in 2016: https://github.com/axic/mango (In the meantime, it really should be possible to build good Github alternatives today on ETH+IFPS.). So code hosting, plus pull request infrastructure, plus issue tracking / comms
author: https://twitter.com/Msiusko
